Utangulizi.content:
**Lishe katika miaka 7–10** ni **hatua ya ukuaji wa haraka, akili, na michezo**. Mtoto anahitaji **virutubisho zaidi** kuliko mtu mzima – kwa sababu anajenga **mifupa, misuli, ubongo, na kinga**. Chakula kinahitaji kuwa **chenye nguvu, salama, na cha kutosha**.

![School Child Eating Lunch](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/school-child-eating-lunch.jpg)

### Faida 10 za Lishe Bora
1. **Ubongo unaokua 95%** – Iron, Iodine, DHA, B-vitamins
2. **Kinga dhidi ya magonjwa** – Vitamin A, C, Zinc
3. **Urefu bora** – 120–140 cm mwisho wa miaka 10
4. **Uzito bora** – 22–35 kg
5. **Kujifunza shuleni** – Choline, Omega-3, Iron
6. **Nguvu ya michezo** – Protini, Calcium, Magnesium
7. **Meno yenye nguvu** – Calcium, fluoride
8. **Kulinda dhidi ya unene** – Fiber, protini
9. **Kujiamini** – Ngozi, nywele, macho yenye afya
10. **Furaha ya familia** – Kula pamoja, mazoezi pamoja

### Malengo ya eBook Hii
- **Chakula cha shule + nyumbani** (chenye nguvu)
- **Maziwa 300–400ml/siku** + vyakula vya mifupa
- **Ratiba 5 ya kila siku** inayoweza kufuatwa Tanzania
- **Vidokezo vya WHO & UNICEF**
- **Suluhisho la matatizo** (kukataa kula, uchovu)

### Vidokezo 5 vya Usalama
1. **Pakia chakula cha shule** kwenye boksi safi
2. **Epuka vyakula vya barabarani** (usafi usio na uhakika)
3. **Osha matunda** kabla ya kula
4. **Kunywa maji ya chupa au yaliyochemshwa**
5. **Hifadhi chakula** kwenye friji

**Kila sandwich, kila glasi ya maziwa – ni mafuta ya shule na maisha yote!**

Virutubisho 7 Muhimu.content:
![School Age Nutrition Pyramid](https://www.mayoclinic.org/-/media/kcms/gbs/patient-consumer/images/2023/08/school-age-nutrition-pyramid.jpg)

### 1. **Iron (8–10 mg/siku)**
- Huzuia anemia, husaidia kujifunza
- **Vyakula**: Nyama nyekundu, kuku, dengu, mchicha
- **Vidokezo**: Kula na **Vitamin C** (nyanya, limau)

### 2. **Calcium (1000–1300 mg/siku)**
- Mifupa na meno
- **Vyakula**: Maziwa, yogurt, dagaa, mboga za majani

### 3. **Vitamin D (600 IU/siku)**
- Kunyonya calcium
- **Vyakula + Jua**: Maziwa, mayai, jua la asubuhi dakika 15

### 4. **Protein (30–35 g/siku)**
- Ukuaji wa misuli, michezo
- **Vyakula**: Mayai, kuku, maharagwe, samaki

### 5. **Omega-3 (DHA)**
- Maendeleo ya ubongo, kujifunza
- **Vyakula**: Samaki, mbegu za chia, karanga za walnut

### 6. **Vitamin A**
- Macho, kinga, ngozi
- **Vyakula**: Karoti, chungwa, mchicha, mayai

### 7. **Fiber (25–30 g/siku)**
- Kuzuia kuvimbiwa, unene
- **Vyakula**: Matunda, nafaka nzima, mboga

![School Food Sources](https://www.nhs.uk/live-well/eat-well/images/school-food-sources-infographic.jpg)

**Kila virutubisho ni hatua kuelekea mtoto mwenye nguvu na akili!**

Chakula cha Shule na Nyumbani.content:
![Packed School Lunch](https://www.babycenter.com/ims/2023/05/packed-school-lunch-4x3.jpg)

### 1. **Chakula cha Shule (Pakia Nyumbani)**
- **Sandwich**: Mkate wa nafaka + kuku/mayarage + nyanya
- **Matunda**: Chungwa, tufaha, ndizi
- **Maziwa**: Pakiti 200ml au yogurt
- **Vitafunwa**: Karanga, biskuti za nafaka

### 2. **Vyakula 6 vya Kila Siku**
| Kundi         | Mifano Tanzania                          |
|---------------|------------------------------------------|
| **Nafaka**    | Wali wa kahawia, ugali, chapati, mtama   |
| **Protini**   | Kuku, samaki, dengu, mayai, nyama        |
| **Maziwa**    | Maziwa, yogurt, jibini                   |
| **Mboga**     | Mchicha, karoti, nyanya, boga            |
| **Matunda**   | Ndizi, embe, chungwa, nanasi             |
| **Mafuta**    | Parachichi, karanga, alizeti             |

### 3. **Vidokezo 5 vya Kula Pamoja**
1. **Kula pamoja** jioni kila siku
2. **Epuka TV** wakati wa kula
3. **Ruhusu mtoto achague** (kati ya 2)
4. **Usilazimishe** – toa nafasi
5. **Pika kwa upendo** – ladha huathiri hamu

![Child Eating with Family](https://www.healthline.com/health/parenting/images/child-eating-with-family.jpg)

**Miaka 7–10: Chakula cha shule + nyumbani ndio mafuta ya akili na michezo!**

Ratiba ya Kila Siku.content:
![School Age Daily Schedule](https://www.unicef.org/parenting/sites/parenting/files/2023-05/school-age-feeding-schedule.jpg)

### Miaka 7–8
| Muda       | Chakula                                      |
|------------|----------------------------------------------|
| 6:30 AM    | Maziwa 200ml + uji wa mtama + mayai          |
| 10:00 AM   | Matunda (ndizi) + karanga                    |
| 1:00 PM    | Wali + kuku + mboga (mchicha, karoti)        |
| 4:00 PM    | Yogurt 100ml + mkate wa nafaka               |
| 7:00 PM    | Ugali + samaki + saladi + maziwa 150ml       |

### Miaka 9–10
| Muda       | Chakula                                      |
|------------|----------------------------------------------|
| 6:30 AM    | Maziwa 150ml + chapati + parachichi          |
| 10:00 AM   | Matunda + biskuti za nafaka                  |
| 1:00 PM    | Wali wa kahawia + nyama + mboga + maharagwe  |
| 4:00 PM    | Maziwa 100ml + karanga                       |
| 7:00 PM    | Ugali + dagaa + mboga + matunda              |

### Vidokezo
- **Maziwa 300–400ml/siku**
- **Kunywa maji lita 1.5–2**
- **Epuka juisi, soda, chai**
- **Pika safi kila siku**

![School Lunch Box](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/school-lunch-box.jpg)

**Ratiba hii inafaa Tanzania – badilisha mboga na nyama tu!**

Vidokezo vya Wataalamu.content:
![WHO School Age Guidelines](https://www.who.int/images/default-source/health-topics/school-age-nutrition/school-feeding-guidelines.jpg)

### Vidokezo 10 vya WHO & UNICEF
1. **Chakula cha shule** kila siku
2. **Maziwa 300–400ml/siku**
3. **Kula mara 5** (3 chakula + 2 vitafunwa)
4. **Chakula chenye nguvu, salama**
5. **Epuka chumvi, sukari, vyakula vya mifuko**
6. **Kula pamoja na familia**
7. **Ruhusu mtoto achague**
8. **Pakia chakula cha shule nyumbani**
9. **Cheza dakika 60 kila siku**
10. **Angalia uzito** kila mwezi

### Vyakula 10 vya Kuepuka
1. Chumvi
2. Sukari
3. Juisi
4. Soda
5. Crisps
6. Biscuits za sukari
7. Chakula cha barabarani
8. Nyama isiyopikwa
9. Dawa bila daktari
10. Kukaanga mara nyingi

### Dawa za Ziada
- **Vitamin D**: 600 IU/siku
- **Iron**: Ikiwa anemia (daktari)

**Afya ya mtoto ni afya ya taifa!**

Matatizo na Suluhisho.content:
![School Age Issues](https://www.webmd.com/parenting/ss/slideshow-school-age-issues.jpg)

### 1. **Mtoto Anakataa Kula**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **mara 5–6**
  - Badilisha **ladha na rangi**
  - Kula **pamoja na familia**
  - Usilazimishe

### 2. **Uchovu Shuleni**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **nyama, dengu, mchicha**
  - Lala **saa 9–10**
  - Cheza **nje**

### 3. **Unene**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Punguza **vyakula vya sukari**
  - Ongeza **mboga na matunda**
  - Cheza **dakika 60**

### 4. **Anemia**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **nyama** mara 3 kwa wiki
  - Mchicha + limau
  - Chukua **dawa za iron** na daktari

### Jinsi ya Kujua Mtoto Anapata Virutubisho
| Miaka | Uzito (kg) | Urefu (cm) |
|-------|------------|------------|
| 7     | 22–28      | 120–128    |
| 10    | 28–35      | 132–140    |

**Matatizo yanapungua kwa lishe bora!**

![Happy School Child](https://www.thebump.com/a/happy-school-child-eating-lunch.jpg)

### Muhtasari
| Miaka | Chakula Kikuu |
|-------|---------------|
| 7–10  | Chakula cha shule + nyumbani + maziwa |
| 10+   | Chakula cha familia pekee |

### Faida za Maisha Yote
- Mtoto mwenye **akili, nguvu, afya**
- Familia yenye **furaha, gharama za matibabu chini**

### Hatua 3 za Leo
1. **Andika ratiba** ya wiki hii
2. **Pakia chakula cha shule**
3. **Tembea kliniki** kwa uzito na vipimo

**Kila sandwich, kila tabasamu – ni mafuta ya shule na maisha yote.**
